parameters.name: IsHistory
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the historical tasks. Default value: 0. Valid values:

*   **0**: returns the current task.
*   **1**: returns the historical tasks.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Specify a value greater than **10**. Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region ID of the O&M task. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~473763~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

> A value of **all** indicates all region IDs.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the O\&M task. Valid values:

*   **rds_apsaradb_ha**: master-replica switchover
*   **rds_apsaradb_transfer**: instance migration
*   **rds_apsaradb_upgrade**: minor version update
